Title: Requires the MTA to submit an annual report on all contract cost overruns that exceed one million dollars
Summary: Requires the MTA to submit an annual report on all minor and major contract cost overruns; establishes such report shall include a list of all contracts where overruns exceed one million dollars, all contracting firms involved, the winning bid amounts, the actual costs incurred, a description of the project, completion delays, and an analysis of why the contract bid amount was exceeded.
LawCode: Add ยง1269-h, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the metropolitan transportation authority to create an annual report on all minor and major contract cost overruns
